news.title: Airbnb says a third of its customer support is now handled by AI in the US and Canada
news.summary: Airbnb was poised to introduce an app that doesn't just search for you, but one that "knows you." CEO Brian Chesky said, "It will help guests plan their entire trip, help hosts better run their businesses, and help the company operate more efficiently at scale."

news.title: Fintech lending giant Figure confirms data breach
news.summary: The company said hackers downloaded “a limited number of files” after breaking into an employee’s account. The hacking group ShinyHunters took responsibility for the breach.

news.title: Why top talent is walking away from OpenAI and xAI
news.summary: AI companies have been hemorrhaging talent the past few weeks. Half of xAI’s founding team has left the company — some on their own, others through “restructuring” — while OpenAI is facing its own shakeups, from the disbanding of its mission alignment team to

news.title: Sex toys maker Tenga says hacker stole customer information
news.summary: The Japanese sex toy maker said a hacker broke into an employee's inbox and stole customer names, email addresses, and correspondence, including order details and customer service inquiries.

news.title: OpenAI removes access to sycophancy-prone GPT-4o model
news.summary: The model is known for its overly sycophantic nature and its role in several lawsuits involving users' unhealthy relationships with the chatbot.

news.title: 4chan’s creator says ‘Epstein had nothing to do’ with creating infamous far-right board /pol/
news.summary: The close timing of Jeffrey Epstein coming into contact with 4chan founder Chris 'moot' Poole and the launch of the "politically incorrect" message board /pol/ that became a breeding ground for QAnon and the white supremacist alt-right movement was coincidental, says Poole. news.title: The Beats Studio Buds Plus are on sale for less than $100 for Presidents Day

news.title: Steam beta lets users add their PC specs to reviews
news.summary: User reviews on Steam may get more informative after a Steam Client Beta update released on Thursday, which adds an option for users to attach their hardware specs to game reviews. news.title: WHO slams US-funded newborn vaccine trial as "unethical"
news.summary: CDC awarded $1.6 million for study birth dose of hepatitis B vaccine in Guinea-Bissau.

news.title: Aided by AI, California beach town broadens hunt for bike lane blockers
news.summary: Hayden AI's cameras will scan for violations from 7 city vehicles.

news.title: OpenAI Is Nuking Its 4o Model. China’s ChatGPT Fans Aren’t OK
news.summary: As OpenAI removed access to GPT-4o in its app on Friday, people who have come to rely on the chatbot for companionship are mourning the loss all over the world.

news.title: Social Security Workers Are Being Told to Hand Over Appointment Details to ICE
news.summary: The recent request goes against decades of precedent and puts noncitizens at further risk of immigration enforcement actions.

news.title: Senators Urge Top Regulator to Stay Out of Prediction Market Lawsuits
news.summary: As prediction market platforms like Polymarket and Kalshi battle regulators in court, Senate Democrats are urging the CFTC to avoid weighing in, escalating a broader fight over the burgeoning industry.
